languages.text: {n}Маска холодной учтивости слетает с лица Владайма, стоит ему втянуть воздух, пронизанный миазмами канализационной вони. Наместник кривится, из последних сил сдерживает желание отвернуть голову в сторону и, наконец, снова берет себя в руки.{/n}

{n}The mask of cold courtesy vanishes from Vladaym's face as soon as he takes in the air, which is permeated with the miasmas of sewer stench. He grimaces, desperately fighting the urge to turn his head away, but eventually regains his composure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маска холодной учтивости слетает с лица Владайма, стоит ему втянуть воздух, пронизанный миазмами канализационной вони. Наместник кривится, из последних сил сдерживает желание отвернуть голову в сторону и, наконец, снова берет себя в руки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The mask of cold courtesy vanishes from Vladaym's face as soon as he takes in the air permeated with miasmas of sewer stench. He grimaces, desperately fighting the urge to turn his head away, but eventually regains his composure.{/n}

{n}The mask of cold courtesy vanishes from Vladaym's face as soon as he takes in the air permeated with miasmas of sewer stench. He grimaces, desperately fighting the urge to turn his head away, but eventually regains his composure.{/n}

{n}The mask of cold courtesy vanishes from Vladaym's face as soon as he takes in the air, which is permeated with the miasmas of sewer stench. He grimaces, desperately fighting the urge to turn his head away, but eventually regains his composure.{/n}

{n}The mask of cold courtesy vanishes from Vladaym's face as soon as he takes in the air, which is permeated with the miasmas of sewer stench. He grimaces, desperately fighting the urge to turn his head away, but eventually regains his composure.{/n}

languages.text: {n}下水の悪臭が漂う空気を吸い込んだ途端、ヴラダイムの顔から冷たく礼儀正しい仮面は消え去った。男は顔をしかめ、目を背けたい衝動と必死に戦ったものの、最終的には平静を取り戻す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of cold courtesy vanishes from Vladaym's face as soon as he takes in the air, which is permeated with the miasmas of sewer stench. He grimaces, desperately fighting the urge to turn his head away, but eventually regains his composure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}下水の悪臭が漂う空気を吸い込んだ途端、ヴラダイムの顔から冷たく礼儀正しい仮面は消え去った。男は顔をしかめ、目を背けたい衝動と必死に戦ったものの、最終的には平静を取り戻す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}当弗拉迪姆闻到空气中下水道的恶臭时，他脸上彬彬有礼的冷淡神情立刻消失了。他露出了厌恶的扭曲表情，极力克制着想把头扭开的冲动，但最终还是恢复了平时的镇定。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of cold courtesy vanishes from Vladaym's face as soon as he takes in the air, which is permeated with the miasmas of sewer stench. He grimaces, desperately fighting the urge to turn his head away, but eventually regains his composure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当弗拉迪姆闻到空气中下水道的恶臭时，他脸上彬彬有礼的冷淡神情立刻消失了。他露出了厌恶的扭曲表情，极力克制着想把头扭开的冲动，但最终还是恢复了平时的镇定。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A Vladaym se le cae la careta de impasible cortesía en cuanto respira el aire impregnado de miasmas de las cloacas. Hace una mueca, luchando desesperadamente contra el impulso de girar la cabeza, pero finalmente recupera la compostura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of cold courtesy vanishes from Vladaym's face as soon as he takes in the air, which is permeated with the miasmas of sewer stench. He grimaces, desperately fighting the urge to turn his head away, but eventually regains his composure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A Vladaym se le cae la careta de impasible cortesía en cuanto respira el aire impregnado de miasmas de las cloacas. Hace una mueca, luchando desesperadamente contra el impulso de girar la cabeza, pero finalmente recupera la compostura.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vladaym perd son masque de politesse froide à la seconde même où il inspire l'air ambiant, imprégné des miasmes puants des égouts. Il grimace, concentrant toutes ses forces pour ne pas tourner la tête, jusqu'à enfin retrouver son sang-froid.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of cold courtesy vanishes from Vladaym's face as soon as he takes in the air, which is permeated with the miasmas of sewer stench. He grimaces, desperately fighting the urge to turn his head away, but eventually regains his composure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym perd son masque de politesse froide à la seconde même où il inspire l'air ambiant, imprégné des miasmes puants des égouts. Il grimace, concentrant toutes ses forces pour ne pas tourner la tête, jusqu'à enfin retrouver son sang-froid.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Maske kalter Höflichkeit verschwindet von Vladayms Gesicht, sobald er die Luft einatmet, die von dem Gestank der Kanalisation erfüllt ist. Er macht eine Grimasse und bekämpft verzweifelt den Drang, den Kopf abzuwenden, gewinnt aber letztlich seine Selbstbeherrschung zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of cold courtesy vanishes from Vladaym's face as soon as he takes in the air, which is permeated with the miasmas of sewer stench. He grimaces, desperately fighting the urge to turn his head away, but eventually regains his composure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Maske kalter Höflichkeit verschwindet von Vladayms Gesicht, sobald er die Luft einatmet, die von dem Gestank der Kanalisation erfüllt ist. Er macht eine Grimasse und bekämpft verzweifelt den Drang, den Kopf abzuwenden, gewinnt aber letztlich seine Selbstbeherrschung zurück.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vladaym'ın yüzündeki soğuk nezaket maskesi, lağım kokusuyla kaplı havayı içine çeker çekmez kayboluyor. Yüzünü buruşturuyor, umutsuzca başını çevirme dürtüsüyle savaşıyor ama en nihayetinde kendine hâkim olmayı başarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of cold courtesy vanishes from Vladaym's face as soon as he takes in the air, which is permeated with the miasmas of sewer stench. He grimaces, desperately fighting the urge to turn his head away, but eventually regains his composure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym'ın yüzündeki soğuk nezaket maskesi, kanalizasyon kokulu mikropla dolu havayı solur solumaz kaybolur. Yüzünü buruşturuyor, umutsuzca başını çevirme dürtüsüyle savaşıyor ama sonunda soğukkanlılığını geri kazanıyor.{/n}
